rect.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 20; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: At any single point in time a ConnAndStmt is
exclusively owned by either a ConnPool or a Conn.
In other words a ConnAndStmt is loaned to a Conn.

line.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 2.35099e-37; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: At any single point in time a
owned by either a StmtPool or a

line.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: The rdbms layer provides support for

line.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: Auto commit is on by default

line.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: The classes within the rdbms::wrapper namespace hide the
implementation details of the underlying database client APIs
from the classes directly within the rdbms namespace.
All of the classes on the outside of the grey rectangle are
direct members of the rdbms namespace and all those
on the inside are members of the rdbms::wrapper
namespace. The namespace name rdbms is implicit in
order not to clutter this diagram.

line.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 0.02; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
